modName: Beautiful Skyrim - HD Clutter and Furniture
summary:
Photo-realistic retex Collection to make Skyrim a more beautiful place.
Working through the textures one folder at a time.
Clutter, furniture, wood and Effects
descriptionHtml:
Photo-realistic retex Collection to make Skyrim a more beautiful place.
Working through the textures one folder at a time.
Please check images section :)
All textures will be double the size as the originals

0.9 on the way gonna be a huge update :)

[URL=http://beautifulskyrim.blogspot.com]Visit my Beautiful Skyrim blog[/URL]

check my other mods 
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1377]Beautiful Skyrim-HD Weaponry[/URL]
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2057]Beautiful Skyrim-HD Armour and Shields[/URL]

Please endorse if you like my retextures thanks

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Releasev0.8
All textures already released improved (check screenshots)
Warhorns
Mehrunes dagon statue
Bucket
Display case
Practice dummy

Releasev0.7
New city banners
Rug improvements
Furniture improvement
Noble furniture set 
Chest improvement
Potion/Poison bottles

Releasev0.6.2
New hd retex of the bar (check images) 

Releasev0.6.1
missed some textures out of main file update fix released

Releasev0.6
Wine bottles
Barset
dining set 
skull pedestal
dirtier textures for all furniture sets

A few samples:
[IMG]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/8056/tesv2011112016431057.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img265.imageshack.us/img265/4935/tesv2011112016455089.jpg[/IMG]

Releasev0.5
Furniture 
Containers
Crates
carts
Sacks
fishing rod
Rugs
Archery target
Bones
stew
cutlery
Leather items
pick axe 
metal cage
Blacksmiths all equipment improved wip
axe improved 
chopping block fixed 
firewood fixed
[IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/2599/choppingblockv05.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/2314/tesv2011111923390195.jpg[/IMG]

Releasev0.4
All Containers
Blacksmiths all equipment
Firewood
all stockade wood
Burned Body
smelter 
bloody rags
Battlemap02

Releasev0.3
Wood axe
Firewood
Chopping block
Chopping block bloody
Snails
Wood trim
Stone trim

Releasev0.2
Alchemy table
Enchantment table
Frost texture improved
Battlemap texture improved

Release v0.1
Fire and Frost impact sets (Removed from mod)
Soulgems 
The Skyrim battle map 

              Files done :)
V This is slightly out of date loads more added will sort soon:) V
